attributes.name: NotificationManager
attributes.description:
The NotificationManager provides the ability to subscribe to
changes to Cache state.

This Feature is what allows EmberData to create subscriptions that
work with any framework or change-notification system.

methods.name: subscribe

return.description: an opaque token to be used with unsubscribe

methods.description: Custom Caches and Application Code should not call this method directly.
methods.name: notify

return.description: whether a notification was delivered to any subscribers
